We are recruiting to fill the position below:

About the Job


	The Sales Representative role involves a blend of technical expertise and sales skills to promote and sell our wastewater treatment products, services, and engineered solutions to industrial and municipal clients.
	In this role, you will act as a liaison between the client and the internal engineering teams.


Key Responsibilities

	Technical Knowledge: An in-depth understanding of wastewater treatment processes and related equipment is an asset.

Sales Representative Job at Ecoscape Limited




        
    

        
        Ecoscape Limited is an environmental management. We are involved in environmental management services such as odour control, fumigation and cleanup services, environmental remediation, training and awareness campaigns. Through initiatives that provide solutions to the problem of air, land and water pollution in our environment, we help control odor, reduce waste from private and public areas such drainages, sewage systems, wastewater treatment plant, industrial plants, businesses and the surroundings. Our goal is to provide practical solutions to improve the quality of life in homes, communities and cities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative
Job Location: Lagos
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



About the Job


	The Sales Representative role involves a blend of technical expertise and sales skills to promote and sell our wastewater treatment products, services, and engineered solutions to industrial and municipal clients.
	In this role, you will act as a liaison between the client and the internal engineering teams.


Key Responsibilities


	Business Development: Identify and solicit potential new clients and business opportunities in assigned territories. This includes cold calling, site visits and networking with the relevant department heads and other client reps.
	Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with existing customers to ensure satisfaction and retention.
	Technical Sales & Support: Prepare and deliver technical presentations and product demonstrations to explain services to customers and prospective customers. Provide technical support, troubleshoot problems and provide solutions.
	Needs Assessment & Solution Design: Confer with clients and engineers to assess client facility and understand the issues as relates to wastewater plants/system, facilitate questionnaire and survey and ensure all relevant information are received for effective proposal delivery.
	Proposal and Contract Management: Prepare detailed proposals, cost estimates, and sales contracts, negotiating terms and conditions to close deals and secure orders.
	Market Analysis & Reporting: Monitor competitor activity, track sales performance, and provide feedback and reports to management on market trends and sales activities.
	Collaboration: Work closely with internal departments, including engineering, service, and project management teams, to ensure seamless project delivery and customer satisfaction.


Required Skills and Qualifications


	Education: Bachelor’s degree or Higher Diploma in engineering or science related discipline.
	Experience: Minimum of 3-5 years of relevant experience in industrial, municipal, or environmental product sales.
	Technical Knowledge: An in-depth understanding of wastewater treatment processes and related equipment is an asset.
	Sales Acumen: Proven sales competencies, including hunting, negotiating, and closing deals, with a goal-oriented and self-motivated attitude.
	Communication: Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills to explain complex technical information clearly to various stakeholders.
	Tools: Proficiency in Microsoft Office
	Mobility: The role often requires significant business travel to customer sites.


Compensation


	This role features a commission-driven pay structure and other benefits, offering strong earning potential based on your sales success.


Note


	As part of our screening process, please complete the application form using the link below.
	The information you provide will help us determine your fit for the role and move you to the next step.

Responsibilities
